typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EMPSRC
source(output(
		Deptno as string,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DEPTSRC
EMPSRC, DEPTSRC join(EMPSRC@DEPTNO == DEPTSRC@Deptno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> INNERJOIN
INNERJOIN select(mapColumn(
		EMPNO,
		ENAME,
		JOB,
		MGR,
		HIREDATE,
		SAL,
		COMM,
		DEPTNO = EMPSRC@DEPTNO,
		Deptno = DEPTSRC@Deptno,
		Dname,
		Loc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SELECTFEWFIELDS
SELECTFEWFIELDS aggregate(groupBy(Dname),
	SUM_OF_SAL = sum(toInteger(SAL)+iifNull(toInteger(COMM),0))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emp_aggregate_csv.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
